<h3 id="X22804">X(22804) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO REFLECTION</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (R^2-SA)*S^2+(17*R^2-7*SW)*SB*SC  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22804) = 3*X(4)+X(2888) = 5*X(4)+X(3519) = 7*X(4)+X(12325) = 3*X(5)-2*X(6689) = X(54)-3*X(381) = 4*X(546)-X(1493) = 3*X(546)-X(22051) = 3*X(1493)-4*X(22051) = 5*X(2888)-3*X(3519) = X(2888)-3*X(6288) = 7*X(2888)-3*X(12325) = X(3519)-5*X(6288) = 7*X(3519)-5*X(12325) = 3*X(3574)-2*X(22051) = X(5876)+2*X(11576) = 7*X(6288)-X(12325) = 4*X(6689)-3*X(10610)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(22804) lies on these lines:
{3,7703}, {4,93}, {5,5944}, {30,1209}, {54,156}, {113,137}, {140,11572}, {195,3843}, {265,10095}, {382,7691}, {539,3845}, {973,6102}, {1478,12956}, {1479,12946}, {1511,1594}, {1539,6153}, {2917,7526}, {3091,12254}, {3153,14128}, {3583,13079}, {3585,18984}, {3627,21230}, {3830,12307}, {3850,8254}, {3851,9707}, {3858,12242}, {3861,13142}, {4846,6145}, {5946,18912}, {5965,21850}, {6000,11802}, {6276,18511}, {6277,18509}, {6286,18514}, {6696,12041}, {7356,18513}, {7579,11449}, {7687,11804}, {7730,12111}, {7979,18525}, {8995,18538}, {9818,9920}, {9905,18492}, {9927,11743}, {9955,12266}, {9985,18500}, {10066,10895}, {10082,10896}, {10110,10115}, {11565,13353}, {11801,13163}, {11808,13754}, {12061,18553}, {12208,18502}, {12316,14269}, {12341,18491}, {12363,18404}, {12480,18495}, {12481,18497}, {12606,18403}, {12699,12785}, {12797,18507}, {12926,18516}, {12936,18517}, {12998,18520}, {12999,18522}, {13121,18542}, {13122,18544}, {13365,13630}, {13367,13413}, {13423,22815}, {13665,19096}, {13785,19095}, {13986,18762}, {15030,18567}, {15052,15091}, {15060,18377}, {15067,18569}, {18761,22781}</p>
<p>
X(22804) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 6288}, {382, 7691}, {3627, 21230}, {7979, 18525}, {12699, 12785}, {12797, 18507}, {13423, 22815}<br>
X(22804) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 13565), (140, 20584)<br>
</p>
